spec_data.Name: ncid-speak
spec_data.Description:
The NCID speak module announces Caller Id information verbally, using
the Festival text-to-speech voice synthesis system.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 07:36:12 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: NCID speak module speaks Caller ID information via voice synthesis
